text: Sarah Burgess (born 7 June 1970) is a British puppeteer, actress and vocal artist who most recently played Phoebe Furchester-Fuzz in the Sesame Street spin-off series The Furchester Hotel for CBeebies. Her previous roles include Trixie and the UK dub of Stingy on the television series LazyTown, Brassy The Rat in the CBeebies series Space Pirates, Fifi le Fleur for Ed and Oucho (CBBC) and puppeteer on the West End production of Doctor Dolittle. She has also performed as an actress and puppeteer in The Sleeping Beauty, Fantastic Mr Fox, Philomen & Baucis, The Frog Prince, Odessa & the Magic Goat, The Talkative Tortoise and The Prince & The Mouse for The Little Angel Puppet Theatre in London and has played Ojo on the European tour of Bear in the Big Blue House. Burgess has also worked on Bunnytown, Teletubbies, Rosie and Jim and Wizadora. ==External links== * The Furchester Hotel * The Little Angel Theatre * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:British voice actresses Category:British puppeteers Category:People from Brighton
title: Sarah Burgess (actress)
